title: Pet-friendly community, Great location, Stainless steel appliances
posting_body: IDEALLY LOCATED APARTMENTS IN SANTA CRUZ
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 657 Sq.
The Hilltop Santa Cruz offers 1 or 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Downtown and the University of California Santa Cruz.
We're in the center of all things that make the Santa Cruz community unique and lovable.
With tons of great amenities and a great selection of floor plans to choose from, you'll love calling our pet-friendly community home.
Enjoy our newly renovated floor plan and unit options with quartz countertops, faux wood flooring, modern kitchen appliances and plenty of storage.
At our apartments in Santa Cruz for rent, we simplify living and maximize convenience to make your life easy.
The Hilltop is a pet friendly community!
No more than one animal is permitted in a bedroom and no more than two animals are permitted in an apartment.
